Action.author: scottz
Action.body: We are in the midst of enhancing the PTE and tools framework to make it simpler for users to run traffic with their own chaincode on their own network by providing a way to read in the wallet pem files and connectionprofile and a simple test spec file. Most of this work is identified in this epic FAB-16240 in addition to tasks FAB-15392 and FAB-15393. Target completion is 4th quarter this year.

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: As part of backlog grooming closing issue as stale. Issue can be reopened in the future.
